title: Quick Question
body: I am currently running the 32-bit league client and was wondering if there is a 64-bit client to download, I've searched a little and couldn't seem to find it.

replies.body:
Nope! The League client was designed as a 32-bit application, but that's okay! The great thing about 64-bit operating systems and chipsets is that they can run 32-bit applications just fine. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
